entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then rain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
